property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tully

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Lucas Blackwood is killed, you may initiate a Military challenge against an opponent of your choice as your next player action this phase

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play a unique card from your hand, kneel Widow's Watch or kneel a Learned character to search your deck for a copy of a card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win dominance by 4 or more total STR, pay X gold to claim X power for Daven Lannister. X is the number of power currently on Daven Lannister. (Limit once per game)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After the challenges phase begins and you are the first player, kneel Deep Den to choose a new first player.

property.name: Text
property.value: While The Laughing Storm is standing, cards cannot be discarded from your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only. Deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Condition

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a POW challenge in which attached character partecipated, kneel Lucky Bones and discard the top 2 cards of your deck to draw 1 card. (Draw 2 cards instead if attached character is Ser Davos Seaworth.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon character only

property.name: Text
property.value: The cost to play non-NOBLE cards cannot be reduced

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After 1 or more cards are discarded from an opponent's deck, stand attached character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Ironborn character only

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: The response effect should be: 'Limit 3 times per round.'

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. Queen

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen characters you control get +1 STR

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose a Dragon character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth, renown, and deadly.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel a learned character or 3 influence to cancel the effects of an event card just played. Then, you may kneel a second Learned character to attach taht event to your House card. You may play that event as if it were in your hand

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only

property.name: Traits
property.value: Maester. House Hightower

property.name: Text
property.value: If Oldtown Advisor has at least 2 Chain attachments attached, it gains: 'Response: Kneel Oldtown Advisor to cancel the effects of an event card just played'

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Hightower

property.name: Text
property.value: Leyton Hightower cannot be saved. Maester characters you control gain: 'immune to opponents' events and attachments'

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments. Renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a participating Maester character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR for each Chain attachment it has. If you win the challenge, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel The Citadel of Oldtown to save a Maester character from being killed or discarded from play, then return that character and all of its Chain attachments to their owners' hands.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Chain

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After attached character kneels, choose 1 card in play. Until the end of the phase, that card gains 1 Trait of your choice. (Limit once per phase).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Setup. Maester character only

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Chain

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the Maester trait and gets +1 STR for each Chain attachment it has.

property.name: Text
property.value: Before shiffling your deck during setup, remove up to 12 Chain attachments with different titles from your deck and place them on The Maester's Path. You cannot win the game if there are any Chain attachments on this card. Response: After you win a challenge, attach 1 Chain from this card to a character you control.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should read: '...attach 1 Chain from this card to a printed Maester character you control.'

property.name: Text
property.value: When reveealed, if you have no City plot cards in your used pile, search your deck for a Maester character of printed cost 3 or lower, and put it into play. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should read: '...search your deck for a neutral or in-House Maester character of printed cost 3 or lower...

property.name: Text
property.value: Maester Response: After you win a challenge in which Maester Luwin participated, search the top 5 cards of your deck for an event card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. House Tully

property.name: Text
property.value: Army, House Tully Immune to opponents' events. While Riders of the Red Fork is in your deck, it meets the criteria to be found by any search effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Condition Attach to a location. Treat attached location as if its printed text box were blank. Any phase: Kneel 1 influence to move Freezing Rain to another location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Maester Reesponse: After a player wins an Intrigue challenge, pay 1 gold to have Maester Creylen claim 1 power.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Clansman

property.name: Text
property.value: Army, Clansman Deadly. Challenges: Discard 1 card from your hand to choose 1 character participating in the same challenge with Black Ears. If you have fewer cards in hand than each opponent, remove that character from the challenge.(Limit once per challenge).

card.name: The Inn of the Kneeling Man

property.name: Traits
property.value: Westeros. Brotherhood

property.name: Text
property.value: Westeros, Brotherhood Response: After a character with STR 2 or lower is knelt, kneel The Inn of the Kneeling Man to stand that character. Use this effect only if it is Summer or Winter. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Lady Any Phase: kneel Shireen Baratheon to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot claim power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Condition Asshai character only. Attached character gets +1 STR for each card in Shadows. Challenges: Discard a card from your Shadows area to give attached character deadly until the end of the phase.

property.value: Ironborn. Lord

property.value: Ironborn, Lord Limited.

property.name: Traits

property.name: Text
property.value: Asshai, Ally Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which Shadow Seer participated, put a Shadow card with the into Shadows from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: HT only. Response: After a character's STR is reduced to 2 or lower by a card effect, return that character and all attachments on it to their owner's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Return a Martell N character you own and control to your hand to choose an opponent's character. Return that character to its owner's hand

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should read: '...to choose an opponent's character of equal or lower printed cost...'

property.name: Text
property.value: Ally Any phase: Bring Jaqen H'ghar out of Shadows by paying the rest of his cost to choose 1 non-Army character in an opponent's dead pile that was killed this phase, and attach it to Jaqen H'ghar as a duplicate. Jaqen H'ghar gains the printed text, base STR, icons, traits and crests of that card. If that duplicate leaves play, retunr Jaqen H'ghar to Shadows.

property.name: Text
property.value: Citadel Any Phase: Return a Maester character you control and all Chain attachments on that character to their owner's hand. Then, draw 1 card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Chain

property.name: Text
property.value: Item, Chain Setup. Maester character only. Response: After attached character kneels, put a character or attachment card of printed cost 1 or lower into play from your hand. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Chain

property.name: Text
property.value: Item, Chain Setup. Maester character only. Response: After attached character kneels, return the topmost attachment card from your discard pile to your hand. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play a Chain attachment from your hand or put one into play from your Agenda, you may put another Chain attachment into play from your hand or discard pile.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Glover

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to opponents' events. While resolving any effect that would allow you to search your deck, you may instead search your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you search the top X cards of your deck, search 1 additional card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose an Intrigue challenge as the attacker, you may initiate an additional challenge this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge reveal up to 3 random cards from the losing opponent's hand. You may discard those cards and replace them with an equal number of cards from the top of that player's deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Maester. House Tyrell

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Maester Lomys and discard 1 power each from any number of characters you control to have each of those characters gain 'cannot be killed' until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play at the beginning of the challenges phase. Challenges: Kneel a character to choose a player. Until the end of the phase, all players use the base claim value from that player's revealed plot card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Storm's End

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character claims power for renown, kneel Tower library to give a Learned character you control renown until the end of the phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Maester. House Goodbrother

property.name: Text
property.value: During the marshalling phase, Maester Murenmure gains: 'Response: Kneel Maester Murenmure to cancel a triggered effect.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Longship Black Wind to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gains deadly. If a character dies for deadly curing this challenge, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose an opponent who must choose and discard 1, 2, or 3 cards from the top of his deck. If he chooses to discard 1 card, stand all Raider characters you control. If he chooses to discard 2 cards, claim 1 power for each Raider character you control. If he chooses to discard 3 cards, each Raider character you control gets +1 STR and gains deadly until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play attachments from opponents' discard piles as if they were in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Maester character only. Marshalling: Kneel Dragon Lore and kneel attached character to reduce the next Dragon character you play this phase to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent kneels a location, choose and stand a location you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sand Snake character only. Attached character is immune to opponent's non-plot card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After you win a challenge in which Archmaester Ebrose participated, he claims 1 power for each Chain attachment he has. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel a Maester character to choose a player. That player may initiate an additional Power challenge this phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Maester. Conclave.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce the cost to play The Conclave by 1 for each Maester character you control. Response: After The Conclave is declared as an attacker or defender, until the end of the phase it gains (choose 1) Stealth, Renown, or Deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Chain.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup. Maester character only. Response: After attached character kneels, choose and discard 1 non-Chain attachment from play. (Limit once per phase)

property.value: Item. Chain.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup. Maester character only. Any Phase: Kneel attached character to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -X STR. X is the number of Chain attachments on attached character (Limit once per phase).

property.name: Text
property.value: Treat all non-unique locations as if their printed text boxes were blank.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Direwolf.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Pay the rest of Guardian Wolf's cost to bring it out of Shadows, knelt, as a participant on your side in any challenge in which you control at least 1 participating Lord or Lady character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only. No attachments. Deadly.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a player searches his deck and reveals 1 or more cards, name 1 of those cards. That player must place that card in his discard pile. Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to draw 1 card.

property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge in which The Regent's Spy participated, look at the top card of the losing opponent's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control with an Intrigue and a POW icon. When you win a challenge in which attached character attacked alone, instead of the normal claim effects, look at the losing opponent's hand and choose and discard 1 card from that player's hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Bastard. Ally

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Until the end of the phase, each of your Asshai characters gets +1 STR and gains the Learned crest.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents cannot play copies of event cards that are in their discard pile.

property.value: Challenges: Kneel Training Vessel to choose an attacking Raider character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +2 STR. If you win the challenge, discard the top card of the losing opponent's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Linked Advisor gets +1 STR for each attachment it has.

property.value: The East

property.name: Text
property.value: During the marshalling phase, you may pay any amount of the gold cost of Army characters using influence instead.

property.value: Challenges: Choose a unique TARGARYEN character. Until the end of the phase, that character does not kneel to attack or defend during POW challenges.

property.value: House Targaryen only

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent draws 1 or more cards outside the draw phase, kneel Informed Acolyte to draw that many cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent triggers a cost reducing effect, kneel Streets of Hellholt to reduce the cost of the next MARTELL card you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 4 influence to return the top 4 cards of your discard pile to your hand.

property.value: House Martell only. Deathbound.

property.value: No attachments

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 for the next challenge of the same type you initiate this phase.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Dragonstone Watchtower and name a card. If an opponent plays or reveals that card this phase, claim 1 power for your house. If that card is not played or revealed stand Dragonstone Watchtower at the end of the phase.

property.value: Ironborn. Raider. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play The Mad Mouse from your hand, choose an opponent's character. If that character dies before the end of the next challenge phase and The Mad Mouse is still in play. The Mad Mouse claims 3 power

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Archmaester Marwyn is killed, resolve the 'when revealed' effect of any plot card in any player's used pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Plot: Kneel a Maester character to choose a player. That player must choose and reveal a new plot card.

property.value: Play before any challenges have been declared this phase. Any Phase: Kneel a Maester character to choose a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, your Maester characters do not kneel to attack or defend during challenges of that type.

property.value: Challenges: Choose a STARK character to get +1 STR until the end of the challenge. Then, search the top 4 cards of your deck for a House Tully card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle the others cards back into your deck.

property.value: Knight. Ally.

property.value: Challenges: Corrupt Contender gets +10 STR untile the end of the challenge. After the challenge resolves, discard Corrupt Contender from play (cannot be saved). Limit once per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an opponent's character. You may spend power counters on attached character as if they were gold tokens in your gold pool.

property.value: Each player's draw cap is reduced from 3 additional cards per round to 2 addditional cards per round.

property.value: House Baratheon only

property.value: If you control a War character, Faceless Man gets +2 STR. If you control a SHAD character Faceless Man gains stealth. If you control a Holy character Faceless Man gains deadly. If you control a NOBLE character, Faceless Man gains a POWER icon.

property.value: Prolific Statesman gains the crests printed on every other character you control.

property.value: Learned characters you control do not kneel to attack or defend during IntrigueRIGUE challenges. Raise your claim value by 1 during IntrigueRIGUE challenges you initiate
